706734f-a.text:
Sheffield Ave., (foreground) at the S.W. corner of Wortman Ave., showing a new incinerator, one of the many being built by the City of New York, after a court order was obtained by the State of New Jersey on the charge that New York was polluting the Jersey beaches by dumping its
garbage at sea.
August 4, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
706734f-a.folder: Sheffield Avenue & Wortman Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706736f-a.text:
Sheffield Ave., east side, between Wortman and Cozine Aves., showing
farm land within the City.
August 4, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
